strategies.name: Contrarian / Fade Favorites
strategies.description: Bet NO on overhyped events at peak hype. When crowd piles into favorites, fade them.
strategies.source: @polycommand — tracked a wallet with 100% win rate on NO/YES reversals, $612K profit from 8 trades

strategies.name: Vitalik Strategy — Bet Against Overhyped Narratives
strategies.description: Bet against events that have high perceived probability but can't actually happen (e.g., Trump receiving Nobel Prize). The real alpha is betting against overhyped narratives, not chasing them.

strategies.name: Bet Against the US
strategies.description: Contrarian strategy: buy NO on US attack/intervention markets. Deposit salary, wait for new US attack market, buy No.
strategies.source: @lorden_eth — tracked a consistently profitable contrarian trader

strategies.name: Sub-5-Cent Contracts (Event Alpha)
strategies.description: Buy very cheap contracts (<$0.05) in illiquid markets. One big bet on resolution — if it hits, massive return. Not arb, it's event alpha.

strategies.name: YES+NO Arbitrage
strategies.description: When YES + NO price < $1.00, buy both for guaranteed profit at resolution. Cleanest edge. Alpha is in execution speed.

strategies.name: Oracle/Broadcast Delay Exploit
strategies.description: 30-second broadcast delay creates free edge. Use raw feeds vs Polymarket's oracle to front-run price adjustments. Information asymmetry that oracle design hasn't priced out.

strategies.name: Prediction Market vs Derivatives Divergence
strategies.description: Track when prediction market odds diverge from derivatives implied probability. That spread is your edge.

strategies.name: Whale Behavior Tracking
strategies.description: Track behavior before odds adjust. Monitor whale clusters, fresh wallet activity. The alpha is in tracking behavior, not guessing outcomes.

strategies.name: Status Quo Bias Exploitation
strategies.description: Bet on the world staying exactly as it is. Trader @denizz: $688K active positions, ~$500K all-time profit by betting on no-change outcomes.

strategies.name: Volatility Split (BTC 15-Min Farming)
strategies.description: Targets 15-minute BTC markets. Doesn't guess direction — farms volatility by playing both sides. Reverse-engineered from top 3 profitable bots on Polymarket.
